Package model.balls

Class ABall

java.lang.Object
provided.extvisitor.AExtVisitorHost<IBallHostID,H>
provided.ballworld.extVisitors.impl.ABallHost<IBall>
model.balls.ABall
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IBall, IBallHost<IBall>, IExtVisitorHost<IBallHostID,IBall>, IObserver<IBallCmd>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultBall, DiscoBall, ErrorBall, PredatorBall, PreyBall
public abstract class ABall extends ABallHost<IBall> implements IBall
Class for a ABall object.

    • ABall

      protected ABall(IBallHostID id, Point p, int r, Point v, Color c, Component container, AConfigBallAlgo installAlgo, IModel2BallAdapter modelAdapter)
      Constructor for an ABall.
      Parameters:
      id - the subclass ID
      p - the ABall's position.
      r - the ABall's radius.
      v - the ABall's velocity.
      c - the ABall's color.
      container - the ABall's container.
      installAlgo - The algo to complete the installation of strategies and any other desired operations
      modelAdapter - The adapter to the model this ball is used in
